Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http

Class StreamPriorityTree

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.StreamPriorityTree
public class StreamPriorityTree extends Object
Manages HTTP/2 stream priority dependency tree for optimal resource allocation.

This class implements RFC 7540 Section 5.3 Stream Priority:

  • Builds and maintains stream dependency trees
  • Calculates relative priorities based on weights and dependencies
  • Provides priority-ordered stream scheduling
  • Handles priority updates via PRIORITY frames

Thread Safety: This class is thread-safe for concurrent access by multiple HTTP/2 connection threads.

Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Constructor Details

    • StreamPriorityTree

      public StreamPriorityTree()
      Creates a new stream priority tree with root node.

  • Method Details

    • updateStreamPriority

      public void updateStreamPriority(int streamId, int weight, int dependsOn, boolean exclusive)
      Adds or updates a stream's priority information.
      Parameters:
      streamId - the stream ID
      weight - the stream weight (1-256)
      dependsOn - the stream this stream depends on
      exclusive - whether this is an exclusive dependency

    • addStream

      public void addStream(int streamId)
      Adds a stream with default priority (depends on root, weight 16).

    • removeStream

      public void removeStream(int streamId)
      Removes a stream from the priority tree. Children of the removed stream become children of its parent.

    • getStreamsByPriority

      public List<Integer> getStreamsByPriority(Collection<Integer> availableStreams)
      Gets streams ordered by priority (highest priority first). Only includes streams that are present in the provided collection.
      Parameters:
      availableStreams - streams available for processing
      Returns:
      list of stream IDs ordered by priority

    • getStreamPriority

      public StreamPriorityTree.PriorityNode getStreamPriority(int streamId)
      Gets the priority information for a stream.
      Parameters:
      streamId - the stream ID
      Returns:
      priority node or null if stream not found

    • debugTree

      public String debugTree()
      Returns a debug representation of the priority tree.
